name: Keep The Lead Away: Mulch Madness
short_description: Mulching around homes to prevent lead exposure
organization: The Near Northwest Neighborhood and Notre Dame Student Government
description: Did you know South Bend has a major lead issue? Children's blood-lead levels in some areas have been documented to be more than twice the safe limit. Old leaded paint chips off of exterior walls and the lead particles find their way into the soil around peoples' homes. This unsafe dirt can get tracked and blown around to places where children can ingest the lead particles. Mulch Madness is one part of a many-pronged strategy to reduce lead exposure by covering bare, toxic soil around homes in the Near Northwest Neighborhood of South Bend. We aim to mulch over 200 homes with your help, as part of Back the Bend.​​​​​

name: Rebuilding Together: Community Day
short_description: Help rehabilitate the homes of low-income homeowners and improve neighborhoods
description: Rebuilding Together is a nonprofit, community-based partnership of volunteers from local government, businesses, and other nonprofits that rehabilitate the homes of low-income homeowners and improve neighborhoods. Help to make vital home repairs for neighbors on this Community Day, April 14th. The day usually starts at 8:00 a.m. and concludes when home repairs are finished (likely around 4:00 p.m.), breakfast, lunch and refreshments provided. Please wear items for outdoor and household work; closed-toe shoes as we will be painting, doing yard work, cleaning and other necessary tasks.

name: Historic Kizer House Project
short_description: Interior Demolition of the Historic Kizer House
description: Assist Indiana Landmarks in pre-construction demolition of interior spaces as it readies the building for community meeting space, receptions, gallery and office uses.  Work will involve removing flooring, plaster, drywall and wood partitions. Wear closed toe shoes. No shorts.

name: Historic Mills House Project
short_description: Interior painting and outdoor landscaping of Historic Tiny House
description: Help Indiana Landmarks finish up the interior painting and install landscaping on this historic tiny house. At less than 900 square feet, the home was saved from demolition last year and will soon be for sale. Help paint interior rooms or install landscape plants and mulch.

name: Unity Gardens
short_description: Mulching, ground prep, transferring plants, laying bricks, and more
description: Unity Gardens is a sustainable local food system that provides free community gardens and educational opportunities throughout South Bend. They aim to provide fresh, healthy food for anyone, and bring diverse people together.

name: Robinson Community Learning Center
address: 921 N Eddy St, South Bend, IN 46617
description: The Robinson Community Learning Center (RCLC) was started in 2001 as an off-campus educational initiative of the President’s Office at the University of Notre Dame in partnership with Northeast Neighborhood residents of South Bend. Volunteers will be repainting 15 of their exterior murals at the Center.

name: Leeper Park
short_description: Paint the stage in Leeper park and redesign flower beds
organization: South Bend Venues, Parks, and Arts
description: Help prepare Leeper Park for a relaxing, beautiful lavender labyrinth landscape feature which will serve the students of Madison Primary Center for years to come. Volunteers will help with basic concrete work and site preparation.
Also, help with cleanup and restore an ampitheater in one of South Bend's beautiful, historic parks.

name: Kelly Park
short_description: Plant trees and paint the park's fence
organization: Northeast Neighborhood and South Bend Venues, Parks, and Arts
description: Volunteers will work at  Kelly Park on a series of beautifying and cleanup projects to promote the general health and look of the grounds.

name: Bowman Creek Cleanup
short_description: Help clean and restore a troubled creek
description: A few blocks west of Riley High School and right next to the Crooked Ewe Brewery, students will help cleanup the mouth of Bowman Creek--stretching from St. Joseph to Carroll Street.The University of Notre Dame, in collaboration with the City of South Bend and other local universities, is currently carrying out a plan to restore the two-mile long tributary from the significant pollution that has accumulated over the years

name: Fire Hydrant Painting
short_description: Paint fire hydrants is historic South Bend
description: Paint Bicentennial Soldier Fire Hydrants around historic South Bend and residential areas. Design is provided, but still calls for creativity!

name: Keep South Bend's Water Clean!
description: Help protect the St. Joseph River from trash and pollution by applying labels to stormwater drains which lead to the river.

name: Care for Senior Citizens' Homes
short_description: Spring clean-up activitis for the homes of senior citizens
